effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.

short_effect.black_white: Lowers the user’s Defense and Special Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Lowers the user’s Defense and Special Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.black_white: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. It also cuts the user’s Defense and Sp. Def.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. It also cuts the user’s Defense and Sp. Def.
